main event: Observers saw a bright light and several small lights around it on multiple nights in Avon, New York.
interesting points: The lights were observed at the same time and place on several following nights,One observer noted a bright red light gliding silently across the sky,The case is categorized as a misinterpretation of conventional objects,The data provided is insufficient for further investigation,The report concludes that the objects likely were stars and aircraft.
sighted object: a bright light and several small lights
